paragraph.paragraph: Developers coming from a background in Eiffel and/or EiffelStudio will find the names and concepts used throughout EiffelEnvision intutive. However, Visual Studio .NET is a very different environment from EiffelStudio. This section of the documentation is intended to give EiffelStudio developers a brief and quick guide to getting started in EiffelEnvision.
paragraph.tip: Recommended: It is recommended that EiffelStudio developers review the urlEiffelEnvision User Interface section of this documentation to become accustomed to how the Visual Studio .NET and EiffelEnvision UIs are presented and used.
paragraph.paragraph:
eiffelstudio_developers.xml EiffelEnvision for EiffelStudio Developers
A brief introduction of facets of EiffelEnvision for the EiffelStudio developers. It outlines the differences in the User Interface and concepts used throughout.

conversion_tool/index.xml EiffelStudio to EiffelEnvision Project Conversion Tool
The project conversion tool installed with EiffelEnvision to import/convert a classic Eiffel or Eiffel for .NET project into EiffelEnvision and Visual Studio .NET.
